items.sentence: When was the last time you brushed your teeth?
When was the last time you played your guitar?
When was the last time you saw Tom wear a tie?
When was the last time you watered the garden?
Where do you go more often, Boston or Chicago?
Could you give me a lift to the train station?
Did you find out what time the meeting starts?
Did you talk to your new classmates yesterday?
I thought both Tom and Mary were still single.
I thought for a second Tom was going to faint.
I thought that Tom was still living in Boston.
Don\'t worry. Someone will come and rescue us.
Don\'t you ever knock before you enter a room?
Don\'t you want your children to learn French?
It takes luck and hard work to achieve wealth.
It used to be thought that the earth was flat.
It was my grandfather that told me that story.
It\'s an awful shame your wife couldn\'t come.
Tom had no intention of giving Mary any money.
Tom had no right to treat Mary the way he did.
